channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hurricane Milton ravaged one of the most popular areas for 'snowbirds' on Florida's Gulf Coast
American to pay $50 million fine for its treatment of disabled passengers
item.description: Airlines must be accountable for their treatment of passengers with disabilities, Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said.

item.title: Billionaire Warren Buffett Sold 56% of Berkshire's Stake in Apple and Is Piling Into Wall Street's Most Prominent Reverse Stock Split of 2024
2024 election updates: Harris calls herself a 'pragmatic capitalist'
item.description: Most polls show Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump neck-and-neck in key states with just about two weeks to go.

item.title: A man accused of threatening to kill Dem election officials will likely plead guilty
item.description: A man accused of making repeated threats to kill the top election officials in Colorado and Arizona as well as judges and federal law enforcement agen...

item.title: WATCH: Terrifying moment dog walker narrowly avoids landslide
item.description: Bystander footage captured the terrifying moment part of a cliff collapsed and fell onto beach huts, with the landslide nearly wiping out a dog walker...

item.title: People Who Went To See A Doctor "Just To Be Sure" And Ended Up Surviving Because Of It Are Sharing Their Stories
19 suspected cartel members killed in shootout with troops
item.description: Sinaloa has seen a surge in violence since the July arrest of the cartel's co-founder Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada in the U.S.

item.title: Israel-Gaza-Lebanon live updates: IDF strikes Beirut after Blinken-Netanyahu talks
item.description: Israel continued its operations in Gaza and Lebanon after Hamas leader and Oct. 7, 2023 attack mastermind Yahya Sinwar was killed in a firefight.

item.title: Principal of top-ranked Virginia high school resigns
Lebanese medics claim Israel is targeting them with airstrikes
item.description: A Lebanese first responder says Israeli strikes have killed eight members of his team in just a month of war with Iran-backed Hezbollah.

item.title: Lilly's weight loss drug shortage deemed over, but hurdles remain
item.description: Some patients fear tirzepatide, sold by Eli Lilly under the brand names Zepbound and Mounjaro, will be hard to get and prohibitively expensive once co...

item.title: North Korean troops are already in Russia, Lloyd Austin confirms
item.description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin confirmed Wednesday the U.S. has evidence that North Korean troops are in Russia.

item.title: Suspect arrested after well-known priest shot dead following Mass
item.description: Father Marcelo Perez, 51, was shot dead by two gunmen just after he had finished celebrating Mass, officials said.

item.title: Harris deploys Obama, Eminem as Trump shows fear amid record-breaking early voting
